001import javax.swing.*;
002import java.awt.*;
003import java.awt.event.*;
004import java.net.URL;
005import java.awt.image.*;
006
007/**
008 * This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a 
009 * text entry area, a text output area and an optional image.
010 * 
011 * @author Michael Kolling
012 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2023)
013 */
014public class UserInterface implements ActionListener
015{
016    private GameEngine aEngine;
017    private JFrame     aMyFrame;
018    private JTextField aEntryField;
019    private JTextArea  aLog;
020    private JLabel     aImage;
021    //Btn Command
022    private JButton    aBtnAudio;
023    private JButton    aBtnQuit;
024    private JButton    aBtnHelp;
025    private JButton    aBtnEat;
026    private JButton    aBtnLook;
027    private JButton    aBtnBack;
028    //Btn Basic Direction
029    private JButton    aBtnNorth;
030    private JButton    aBtnSouth;
031    private JButton    aBtnEast;
032    private JButton    aBtnWest;
033    //Btn Other Direction
034    private JButton    aBtnUp;
035    private JButton    aBtnDown;
036    private JButton    aBtnDownWest;
037    private JButton    aBtnDownEast;
038    private JButton    aBtnUpNorth;
039    private JButton    aBtnUpEast;
040    private JButton    aBtnUpWest;
041    private JButton    aBtnDownSouth;
042    
043    private boolean    aBool;
044    
045    /**
046     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
047     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is
048     * needed.
049     * @param pGameEngine  The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
050     */
051    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
052    {
053        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
054        this.createGUI();
055        this.aBool = true;
056    } // UserInterface(.)
057
058    /**
059     * Print out some text into the text area.
060     */
061    public void print( final String pText )
062    {
063        this.aLog.append( pText );
064        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
065    } // print(.)
066
067    /**
068     * Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break.
069     */
070    public void println( final String pText )
071    {
072        this.print( pText + "\n" );
073    } // println(.)
074
075    /**
076     * Show an image file in the interface.
077     */
078    public void showImage( final String pImageName )
079    {
080        String vImagePath = "" + pImageName; // to change the directory
081        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource( vImagePath );
082        if ( vImageURL == null )
083            System.out.println( "Image not found : " + vImagePath );
084        else {
085            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL );
086            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
087            this.aMyFrame.pack();
088        }
089    } // showImage(.)
090
091    /**
092     * Enable or disable input in the entry field.
093     */
094    public void enable( final boolean pOnOff )
095    {
096        this.aEntryField.setEditable( pOnOff ); // enable/disable
097        if ( pOnOff ) { // enable
098            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 500 ); // cursor blink
099            this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this ); // reacts to entry
100        }
101        else { // disable
102            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 0 ); // cursor won't blink
103            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener( this ); // won't react to entry
104        }
105    } // enable(.)
106    
107    /**
108     * Set up graphical user interface.
109     */
110    private void createGUI()
111    {
112        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame( "Crash ship" ); // change the title !
113        this.aEntryField = new JTextField( 34 );
114
115        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
116        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
117        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
118        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(450, 450) );
119        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(200,200) );
120        
121        //JButton
122        this.aBtnAudio = new JButton("play audio");
123        this.aBtnAudio.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
124        
125        this.aBtnQuit = new JButton("quit");
126        this.aBtnQuit.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
127    
128        this.aBtnHelp = new JButton("help");
129        this.aBtnHelp.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
130        
131        this.aBtnEat = new JButton("eat");
132        this.aBtnEat.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
133        
134        this.aBtnLook = new JButton("look");
135        this.aBtnLook.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
136        
137        this.aBtnBack = new JButton("back");
138        this.aBtnBack.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
139        
140        
141        this.aBtnNorth = new JButton("North");
142        this.aBtnNorth.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
143        
144        this.aBtnSouth = new JButton("South");
145        this.aBtnSouth.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
146
147        this.aBtnEast = new JButton("East");
148        this.aBtnEast.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
149
150        this.aBtnWest = new JButton("West");
151        this.aBtnWest.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
152        
153        
154        this.aBtnUp = new JButton("Up");
155        this.aBtnUp.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
156        
157        this.aBtnDown = new JButton("Down");
158        this.aBtnDown.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
159        
160        this.aBtnDownWest = new JButton("DownWest");
161        this.aBtnDownWest.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
162        
163        this.aBtnDownEast = new JButton("DownEast");
164        this.aBtnDownEast.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
165        
166        this.aBtnUpNorth = new JButton("UpNorth");
167        this.aBtnUpNorth.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
168        
169        this.aBtnUpEast = new JButton("UpEast");
170        this.aBtnUpEast.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
171        
172        this.aBtnUpWest = new JButton("UpWest");
173        this.aBtnUpWest.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
174        
175        this.aBtnDownSouth = new JButton("DownSouth");
176        this.aBtnDownSouth.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(100,25));
177        
178        
179        //JLabel
180        this.aImage = new JLabel();
181
182        //temporraire je change la size de l'emplacement de l'image 
183        //this.aImage.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(500, 400));
184        
185        JPanel vPaneCommand = new JPanel();   
186        vPaneCommand.setLayout(new GridLayout(3, 2) );
187        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnAudio, BorderLayout.CENTER );
188        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnQuit,BorderLayout.CENTER );
189        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnHelp,BorderLayout.CENTER );
190        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnEat,BorderLayout.CENTER );
191        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnLook,BorderLayout.CENTER );
192        vPaneCommand.add(this.aBtnBack,BorderLayout.CENTER );
193
194        JPanel vPaneDirection = new JPanel();
195        vPaneDirection.setLayout(new GridLayout(3, 4) );
196        vPaneDirection.add(this.aBtnNorth, BorderLayout.NORTH );
197        vPaneDirection.add(this.aBtnSouth,BorderLayout.SOUTH );
198        vPaneDirection.add(this.aBtnEast,BorderLayout.EAST );
199        vPaneDirection.add(this.aBtnWest,BorderLayout.WEST );
200        
201        vPaneDirection.add(this.aBtnUp,BorderLayout.NORTH );
202        vPaneDirection.add(this.aBtnDown,BorderLayout.SOUTH );
203        vPaneDirection.add(this.aBtnDownWest,BorderLayout.WEST );
204        vPaneDirection.add(this.aBtnDownEast,BorderLayout.EAST );
205        vPaneDirection.add(this.aBtnUpNorth,BorderLayout.NORTH );
206        vPaneDirection.add(this.aBtnUpEast,BorderLayout.EAST );
207        vPaneDirection.add(this.aBtnUpWest,BorderLayout.WEST );
208        vPaneDirection.add(this.aBtnDownSouth,BorderLayout.SOUTH );
209        
210        
211        JPanel vMainPanel = new JPanel();      
212        vMainPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout()); // ==> only five places
213        vMainPanel.add( this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH );
214        vMainPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
215        vMainPanel.add( this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
216        vMainPanel.add( vPaneCommand, BorderLayout.EAST);//le placer Ã  l'est
217        vMainPanel.add( vPaneDirection, BorderLayout.WEST);//le placer Ã  l'est
218        
219        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( vMainPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER );
220
221        // add some event listeners to some components
222        this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this );
223        
224        this.aBtnAudio.addActionListener( this );
225        this.aBtnQuit.addActionListener( this );
226        this.aBtnHelp.addActionListener( this );
227        this.aBtnEat.addActionListener( this );
228        this.aBtnLook.addActionListener( this );
229        this.aBtnBack.addActionListener(this );
230        
231        this.aBtnNorth.addActionListener( this );
232        this.aBtnSouth.addActionListener( this );
233        this.aBtnEast.addActionListener( this );
234        this.aBtnWest.addActionListener( this );
235        
236        this.aBtnUp.addActionListener( this );
237        this.aBtnDown.addActionListener( this );
238        this.aBtnDownWest.addActionListener( this );
239        this.aBtnDownEast.addActionListener( this );
240        this.aBtnUpNorth.addActionListener( this );
241        this.aBtnUpEast.addActionListener( this );
242        this.aBtnUpWest.addActionListener( this );
243        this.aBtnDownSouth.addActionListener( this );
244        
245        // to end program when window is closed
246        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener(
247            new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
248                @Override public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE)
249                {
250                    System.exit(0);
251                }
252        } );
253     
254        this.aMyFrame.pack();
255        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
256        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
257    } // createGUI()
258
259    /**
260     * Actionlistener interface for entry textfield.
261     */
262    @Override public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE ) 
263    {
264        String vGo = "go";
265        if (pE.getSource() == this.aBtnAudio) {
266            this.aBool =! this.aBool;
267            if(aBool == false) {
268                this.aBtnAudio.setText("stop audio");
269                this.aEngine.toggleAudio();
270            }else {
271                this.aBtnAudio.setText("play audio");
272                this.aEngine.toggleAudio();
273            }
274        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnQuit ){
275            this.aEngine.interpretCommand(this.aBtnQuit.getActionCommand());   
276            
277        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnHelp ){
278            this.aEngine.interpretCommand(this.aBtnHelp.getActionCommand()); 
279            
280        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnEat ){
281            this.aEngine.interpretCommand(this.aBtnEat.getActionCommand());
282            
283        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnLook ){
284            this.aEngine.interpretCommand(this.aBtnLook.getActionCommand());
285            
286        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnBack ){
287            this.aEngine.interpretCommand(this.aBtnBack.getActionCommand());
288            
289        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnNorth ){
290            this.aEngine.goRoom(new Command(vGo, "north"));
291                
292        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnSouth ){
293            this.aEngine.goRoom(new Command(vGo, "south"));
294        
295        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnEast ){
296            this.aEngine.goRoom(new Command(vGo, "east"));
297        
298        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnWest ){
299            this.aEngine.goRoom(new Command(vGo, "west"));
300            
301        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnUp ){
302            this.aEngine.goRoom(new Command(vGo, "up"));
303        
304        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnDown ){
305            this.aEngine.goRoom(new Command(vGo, "down"));
306            
307        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnDownWest ){
308            this.aEngine.goRoom(new Command(vGo, "downwest"));
309            
310        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnDownEast ){
311            this.aEngine.goRoom(new Command(vGo, "downeast"));
312            
313        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnUpNorth ){
314            this.aEngine.goRoom(new Command(vGo, "upnorth"));
315            
316        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnUpEast ){
317            this.aEngine.goRoom(new Command(vGo, "upeast"));
318            
319        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnUpWest ){
320            this.aEngine.goRoom(new Command(vGo, "upwest"));
321            
322        }else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBtnDownSouth ){
323            this.aEngine.goRoom(new Command(vGo, "downsouth"));
324        
325        }
326            else 
327            // no need to check the type of action at the moment
328            // because there is only one possible action (text input)
329        this.processCommand(); // never suppress this line
330    } // actionPerformed(.)
331
332    /**
333     * A command has been entered in the entry field.  
334     * Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it.
335     */
336    private void processCommand(){
337        String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
338        this.aEntryField.setText( "\n" );
339
340        this.aEngine.interpretCommand( vInput );
341    } // processCommand()
342    
343    public void closeFrame() {
344        if (this.aMyFrame != null) {
345            this.aMyFrame.dispose();
346        }
347    } //closeFrame()
348    
349    
350} // UserInterface
